.vs/
*.user

bin/
obj/

# NuGet packages
*.nupkg
packages/
*.snupkg

TestResults/
*.trx

*.publishsettings

# Others
*.log

*.bak

# Ignore local settings
appsettings.Development.json
appsettings.Local.json

# Ignore files generated by IDE
*.swp
*.sln.ide

# Ignore output folders
bin/Debug/
bin/Release/
